segments.text: There's a boy on a stool, trying to reach a cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly and unstable, it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching and balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They both seem completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, this is too stressful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really stop them before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
